Name: Suspension of parking regulations adjacent to schools during drop-off and pick-up times.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the suspension of parking regulations adjacent to schools during drop-off and pick-up times.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section one. Subchapter 2 of chapter one of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of  New York is amended by adding a new section 19-163.1 to read as follows:
§19-163.1 Suspension of parking rules around schools.  While school is in session, all parking rules shall be suspended between 8:00 a.m. and 8:30 a.m. and between 2:45 p.m. and 3:15 p.m. on all streets adjacent to any school under the jurisdiction of the New York city department of education or any non-public school that provides educational instruction to students at or below the fifth grade level.
§2. This local law shall take effect thirty days after its enactment into law.
